title: Noxus Riven
body:
A Noxus version of Riven wearing armor that resembles the same concept as the Noxus Poppy skin. Thought it would be a nice idea for all the Noxus lovers out there, plus she was originally from Noxus. Had this idea for a long time but didn't know where to share it.
Please comment if you have any suggestions!

replies.body: Ever seen the splash art of redeemed riven? Idk about you but to me it looks like shes wearing armor which even looks like its from noxus
